featured.text: The structure, to be erected in the redeveloped areas of the capital’s 13th district, will cost 250 million francs (US$42 million).

definition.zh_def: 法郎，一種曾在法國及其他國家使用的貨幣單位。
definition.en_def: A former currency unit used in France and other countries.
definition.example: Before the euro was introduced, France used the franc as its currency.
